name: Prototype: I Pet A Dog In This One
name_original: Prototype: I Pet A Dog In This One
description:
I Pet A Dog In This One is a dog-petting adventure in Twine! This is a prototype, and this project is currently in development. 

My ability to continue developing games is directly dependent on my ability to pay rent! 

Please consider supporting the making of this project by backing my second graphic novel Boyfriends & Their Giant Dog on Kickstarter: http://bit.ly/BoyfriendsGiantDog
